channel.title: Comments on: Moyo Chirandu
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Gono ReGukwe
item.dc:creator: Gono ReGukwe
item.description: The other chiefs used nicknames like "Kanhata", "Chiwoko" and Kusasana can anyone assign these nicknames to names of the Nhowe chiefs?
item.content:encoded: The other chiefs used nicknames like “Kanhata”, “Chiwoko” and Kusasana can anyone assign these nicknames to names of the Nhowe chiefs?

item.title: By: Moses Mrewa
item.dc:creator: Moses Mrewa
item.description: I strongly feel Nhowe Chieftainship not Mangwende Chieftainship. The name Mangwende only surfaced around 1859 long after the Nhowe Chieftainship came into existence.
item.content:encoded: I strongly feel Nhowe Chieftainship not Mangwende Chieftainship. The name Mangwende only surfaced around 1859 long after the Nhowe Chieftainship came into existence.
